mapper.delete: DELETE FROM r_role_menuitem WHERE roleid=#{roleid} AND itemid in (SELECT ID FROM r_menuitem WHERE menuid=#{menuid})
mapper.select: SELECT rmi.ID AS id, rmi.ITEMCODE AS itemcode, rmi.ITEMNAME AS itemname, rmi.MENUID AS menuid, rmi.RESOURCE AS resource, rmi.SORT AS sort, r.ROLEID AS roleid FROM ( SELECT * FROM r_menuitem rmi WHERE rmi.MENUID = 10 AND rmi. STATUS = 'N' ) rmi LEFT JOIN r_role_menuitem r ON ( r.ROLEID = 1 AND r.ITEMID = rmi.ID )
